Title: Mock Two Piece Evening Dress with Train

Featured-image: CJ224-navy-mock-two-piece-evening-dress-with-train_p.jpg

----

Description: A mock two piece gown with a court train. Sparkling sequins detailed the bodice and the trim of the open back. The midriff is shown off with a  sheer fabric. The floor length skirt is edged with the sequins that drip into the skirt ending above the knees.
